General.Name: GeeCee Ventures Limited
General.Description: Geecee Ventures Limited engages in the real estate development, power generation, and financing and investing activities in India. The company operates through Real Estate, Investments /Financing, and Wind Power Generation segments. It develops residential, commercial, and affordable housing projects. The company was formerly known as Gwalior Chemical Industries Limited and changed its name to Geecee Ventures Limited in January 2010. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Mumbai, India.
